entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PAX Tar timestamps from extended attributes parsing may not be a `double`, but `long.long` #70801
    7.0.0
  • Repo requires .NET 7 Preview 5 #70799
    7.0.0
  • Corrupted output writing large array to an AnonymousPipeServerStream on linux using netcoreapp3.1 #70798
  • .NET 6: JsonContent.Create(obj) should set Content-Length HTTP request header #70793
  • Test failure: Interop\\IJW\\CopyConstructorMarshaler\\CopyConstructorMarshaler\\CopyConstructorMarshaler.cmd #70791
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'assertion->op2.u1.iconFlags != GTF_EMPTY' #70790
    7.0.0
  • x86: Assertion failed '!"Too many unreachable block removal loops"' during 'Global local var liveness' #70786
    8.0.0
  • JsonNode? control = JsonNode.Parse(json) => System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException #70785
  • [ICU] Tracking issue for all culture, language and translation problems #70781
  • System.Private.CoreLib.dll not found in .NET 7 Preview 5 #70776
    7.0.0
  • .NET 5 regression in Math.Min behaviour with NaNs #70775
    6.0.x
  • [Wasm][AOT] Profiled AOT compilation fails with Segmentation fault #70773
    7.0.0
  • Test failure tracing\\eventpipe\\diagnosticport\\diagnosticport\\diagnosticport.cmd #70766
  • [wasm] Tracking issue for build/bundler changes #70762
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Numerics.Tests.BigIntegerConstructorTest.RunCtorSingleTests #70761

Closed

  • Unsupported features to Cross Compile to linux-arm64 on wsl and also osx #70250
  • Collectible AssemblyLoadContext is collected by GC while type from it is still alive #68434
  • .NET 6 crashes on a macOS 12.x virtual machine on Apple Silicon (arm64) #64103
  • When an assembly load fails, include detailed error information in the exception #63233
  • Inconsistent behaviour with fr-CA CultureInfo across platforms #70789
  • [wasm] Reduce amount of exception filtering in code reached from Blazor template #50281
    7.0.0
  • Loading Native Images for corresponding assemblies from custom cache transparently #60250
  • ReadyToRun app fails if custom attributes have types with utf8 characters #63481
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.ConnectWithRevocation_StapledOcsp(offlineContext: False) #70322
    7.0.0
  • win-arm64 NativeAOT CI job frequently times out in PRs #70549
    7.0.0
  • Enterprise authentication tests are failing with PlatformNotSupportedException #68366
    7.0.0
  • BeginGetHostAddresses returns unexpected results when using systemd-resolved #33145
    Future
  • Release tag 3.1.26 #70774
  • Core 6.0 HttpClient throwing timeout exception #70691
  • [wasm][aot] Exception Handling Improvements #63399
    7.0.0
  • Inconsistent results working with Tasks in AOT-Published Blazor.WebAssembly builds #70286
  • codesign fails on osx-arm64 binary #70780
  • Race condition results in Assembly reference equality being false #70742
    7.0.0
  • Huge performance regression during JIT code generation with ILGenerator on .NET 6.0 (Windows x64) #68953
    6.0.x
  • Test `CertificateValidationRemoteServer.ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback` is failing on Android #70469
    7.0.0
  • Issues with hot reloading html changes from a Razor file when @bind is used in Blazor WASM .NET 6 Preview 3 #51855
    7.0.0
  • `JIT\HardwareIntrinsics\General\Vector256` test crashes with an `SEHException` on a machine without AVX2 #70663
    7.0.0
  • JsonConverter from unused JsonSerializerOptions throws for missing metadata #70732
  • [wasm] Unify BuildWinWasmRuntimes and BuildWasmRuntimes targets #51553
    7.0.0
  • Blazor Hot Reload: MatBlazor Button breaks Hot reload in Dotnet 6 preview 3. #51126
    7.0.0
  • Exception in MsQuicStream.HandleWriteStartState can abandon CancellationTokenRegistration #55437
    7.0.0
  • VN does not number some HWI loads properly #63499
    7.0.0
  • how can I add project reference output to sub folder #63036
  • After upgrade .net core from 3.0 to 6.0, System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (10060) randomly shows up #69296
    Future
  • `impNormStructVal` should not retype nodes that cannot be retyped #70666
    7.0.0
  • `genPutArgSplit` on ARM can load of bounds #70051
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix corerun for assemblies with mismatched filename #70800
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Fix jump removal regression blocking jit_stress_splitting in runtime-jit-experimental #70797
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixing the handling of Positive NaN in Math.Min for float/double #70795
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Don't use addressing modes for volatile loads for gc types #70794
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: rework optCanonicalizeLoop #70792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update the version of dotnet used for Maui stuff from 6.0.3 to 6.0.4. #70788
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Revert "[wasm][debugger] Implement get bytes from loaded_files using debugger protocol." #70787
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [Mono] Fix C4018 warnings round II #70783
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Allow `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_FLD` on the LHS of block copies #70782
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD` call args on x86 #70779
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD` call args on Windows x64 #70777
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fix 42219 #70770
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Minor refactoring for `UpgradeToRegexGeneratorAnalyzer` #70767
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Initialize Generation Aware Analysis later #70764
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [tests] Extend partial disablement of SkippingHiddenFiles (#65280) #70763
    area-System.IO

Merged

  • Find&replace FastInterlock* with Interlocked* #70784
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Upgrade SDK to Preview 5 #70117
    area-Infrastructure
  • Make ConnectWithRevocation_StapledOcsp more resilient to being slow #70413
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Remove GSS_KRB5_CRED_NO_CI_FLAGS_X code #70772
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Enable IlcTrimMetadata by default #70201
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update .net version for asp.net spmi collection script #70778
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Faster long->int overflow checks #69865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Enable addressing modes for gc types #70749
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Predicate for valid Tracker Reference is inverted #70709
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Handle HW exceptions on Windows without redirection #70428
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Enabling asynchronous thread suspension at GC safe points on ARM64 Windows #70769
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix race condition in LoaderAllocator::CompareExchangeValueInHandle #70765
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [Mono] Fix C4018 round I #70417
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • NativeAOT Unlock assignability comparison in reflection-free #70726
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable CertificateValidationRemoteServer.ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback on Android #70768
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Updating HWIntrinsicInfo::lookupId to not accelerate Vector256 APIs when AVX2 is unsupported #70686
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Support `PUTARG_STK(STRUCT LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD)` on ARM/64 #70256
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Refactor how implicit byrefs are morphed #70243
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle mis-sized structs in ARM/64 `PUTARG_SPLIT` codegen #70249
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Support `PUTARG_STK(STRUCT LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD)` on x86/Unix x64 #70702
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix value numbering of HWI loads #70621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not change `gtRetClsHnd` in `impNormStructVal` #70699
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_FLD` on the RHS of block copies #70633
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Small MsQuicStream refactorings #70433
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [NativeAOT] Enabling return address hijacking on ARM64 Windows #70740
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add note about backward branch constraints to ECMA-335 augments #70760
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Fix Assembly.LoadFrom resolver #70537
    Servicing-approved, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 6.0.7
  • Revert "Fix usage of GSS_KRB5_CRED_NO_CI_FLAGS_X" #70747
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix AttributePresence in composite mode #70737
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Updated

  • Harden for null byrefs #70317
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add TarEntry conversion constructors #70325
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix default log color behavior when console is redirected #70504
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • JIT: Optimize range checks for X >> CNS and for short/byte indices #67141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for cross module inlining and cross module generic compilation to Crossgen2 #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Make SString typed on encoding #69748
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Allow child process reaping by other thread(library) #70705
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Unpin locals, attempt 2 #70655
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Trying to remove a int to int cast in lowering #70756
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use crypto.subtle for HMAC on Browser WASM #70745
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enabling console logger queue length and mode to be configurable #70186
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Add two new stages to prepare for our new custom type marshalling design. #70598
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Implement UnixFileMode APIs #69980
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix SpanHelpers.Reverse regression #70650
    area-System.Memory
  • Add event to capture min/max threads #70063
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Optimize multi-dimensional array access #70271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove workaround to get pauseOnExceptions setting #70748
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add icon to dotnet.exe on Windows #70578
    area-Host
  • Add limited support for LocalCertificateSelectionCallback for QUIC #70716
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [wasm] Add support for per-project customization of helix work items #70461
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Make the archives created on Unix have the read permissions by default #70735
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Assertion prop fix #70643
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Narrow cast fix #70518
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Convert fallback path of GetCommandLineArgs to managed #70608
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Implement NarrowUtf16ToAscii for AArch64 #70080
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Update DependencyGraphViewer to allow for DGML reading #70690
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Test additional NativeAOT Lib testing #70212
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve TLS1.3 detection in registry for QUIC #70730
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Avoid infinite loop in case of heap corruption #70759
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • VM: Better strategy for TryReserveInitialMemory on arm64 (jump stubs) #70707
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Fix race condition between GCInfo and Rundown #70609
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix for #70007, fallback to old implementation if optimized way fails #70073
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.12 #70693
    area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • JSON contract customization #70435
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [API Implementation]: Add `Order` and `OrderDescending` to `Enumerable` and `Queryable` #70525
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Removes abstract providers and mock from S.N.Quic #70421
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Relax Socket.EnableBroadcast getter exception behavior #70728
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [QUIC] Buffered reads #70148
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [wasm]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #66304
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Bring up PPC64 little endian #70734
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, arch-ppc64le
  • [wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #70746
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Implement Vector128 version of System.Buffers.Text.Base64 DecodeFromUtf8 and EncodeToUtf8 #70654
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • Upstream coreclr and pal changes to support powerpc (ppc64le) architecture #69105
    area-PAL-coreclr, arch-ppc64le
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimization for full range checks (#70145) #70222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Enable string properties evaluation of Length and Char[]. #67028
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix ILGenerator maxstack computation #70388
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
